com.opentok.cloud.controller.signal

Interface SignalEvent


  • public interface SignalEvent
    Defines a signal-related event in a session.
    See Also:
    Session.addSignalListener(), SignalListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getData()
      Returns the JSON-encoded data string for the signal.
      Connection getFromConnection()
      Returns the Connection that sent this signal.
      java.lang.Object getSource()
      Used to identify the session the event belongs to.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns the type string for the signal.
